channel.title: Dayzs on Akol
channel.description: Recent content in Dayzs on Akol

item.title: Main Menu link
item.description: You are probably here because you clicked the Mounts & Sights website link in the DayZ main menu. You can find more about the mod in its Steam Workshop page. If you are enjoying the mod and want to foment further development, consider making a donation:

item.title: QR Code
item.description: You are probably here because you scanned one of the QR codes present in the Mounts & Sights mod for DayZ. You can find more about it in its Steam Workshop page. Read more about this topic If you are enjoying the mod and want to foment further development, consider making a donation: If you’ve been redirected here from a server that is not using a mod called “Mounts & Sights”, it means that you are playing in a server that is using a illegal version of the mod.
